name: Planetary Crunch
description:
A game for Ludum Dare 52

Description:

You play as a race of bloodthirsty aliens. Harvest biomass until you devastate the universe!

Plan your invasion - break the human resistance.

Features:

- Play on the surface of planets

- RTS/CG hybrid

- Completely original graphics (neural networks were too tasty - alien icons are drawn by midjourney)

- Narrative! Drama! Crunch!

- Bugs! Pun intended

How to play:

Selection brood for invasion and drop location with LMB

Rotate camera with RMB + drag

Unit Cost and City Value — Biomass (Purple)

The strength of units and cities — Attack (red)

An object is captured if your Brood's strength is greater than or equal to its strength. Beware of human reinforcements!
